title: Question, is ranked 3v3 disabled?
body: Me and some friends were going to play ranked 3v3, but the option to do this is gone, was this an oversight or were they taken out? Just wondering thanks for everything riot! New skins look beautiful.

replies.body: Ranked Team 3v3 and 5v5s are currently on a specific schedule depending on the region you're playing from.  The period it will be enabled will also vary on it being a weekend or weekday.  The schedule with specific times are available in our [ranked team schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) guide.  Hope that help, and good luck in your team games!
